NewsItem.HEADLINE: Small Cell Backhaul Annual Market Study 2018 with Forecast
NewsItem.SUMMARY: A global market study on backhaul and fronthaul for small cells.
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: This report includes analysis of small cells for backhaul, midhaul, and fronthaul requirements. Then each type of small cell artchitecture is evaluated for the use of fiber, NLOS, LOS, and copper backhaul. Wireless, Free Space Optics, and other backhaul/fronthaul equipment are forecasted globally.
NewsItem.KEYWORDS: Backhaul fronthaul midhaul eCPRI CPRI small cell RRH
NewsItem.ATTACHMENT: mexp-BACKHAUL-18 rev0 ericsson.pdf, MEXP-BACKHAUL-18 rev0 ericsson.xlsx,
